p: For these reasons, we thought it prudent to share up-to-date information regarding the best neurosurgical practices during the COVID-19 pandemic. We hope these timely communications will lead to better preparedness for taking care of our patients and maintaining the safety and well-being of all healthcare workers on the front lines, while enabling us to continue to promote innovations through educational and teaching opportunities that may take place outside the operating room. In addition, perhaps there will be an increased focus on basic and translational viral science that will lead to more rapid therapeutic responses.
